response.overview: After his breakup with famous actress Satomi (Tomoda Ayaka) is embellished and he is practically cast out of the industry, former actor Misawa Takuma falls from grace and moves to a rural town. He is handsome but has a bit of a flawed personality. But the one who catches his eye is a rather plain woman named Rika (Yokoyama Mirei). He tries to make her more to his taste, but he doesn't notice any changes and they break up. Unable to adapt to life in the rural town, Takuma soon begins to miss the city life. What will become of him? Meanwhile, heartbroken, she consults her classmate Rin (Itsuki Rin) and starts dating the heir to a farming family she introduces to her, but...
response.title: Pink Female Body Encyclopedia
